name: Jumping Square (abdallah_155)
description:
WEEKLY GAME JAM 133 - Theme: Wall Jump

You are a square and you believe you can touch the sky, so you are climbing and climbing up to the sky running on The Walls Of Glory dodging spikes by jumping from one side to the other and collecting coins on your way (because they are shiny).

There are five Stages : Purple - Green - Yellow - Red - White

There is One Little Easter Egg for those who is patient enough.

Controls :

Simply Press Space to Jump
